item.title: DON'T PANIC.
item.description: "The ships hung in the sky in much the same way that bricks don't." Rereading the five books in The Hitchhiker’s Guide trilogy is the best self-care Iâ€™ve done throughout the pandemic. I would have loved to meet Douglas Adams, what a great guy he must have been to be friends with! It’s hard for me to imagine the kind of personality and world view one would have to have to create such an imaginative and fascinating adventure story.
